channel.title: Luminosity 474 Debug Mode On? Actions On Screen?
channel.description: Hey Guys, Okay So I Downloaded Luminosity 474 v1 And I Really Like It Because Npc/Players Are Clipped So Its Perfect For Me Because I'm A Beginner But Everytime I Click On Something These Random Things Come In Chat Bar: Example "Actionbutton: 33206 Fight mode: 2 Dialouge action: 0" Keeps Comming Up And Its Anoying, How Do I Turn This Off So It Doesn't Keep Spamming My Chat Bar Or Other Players When I Eventually Get It Online?

item.title: Luminosity 474 Debug Mode On? Actions On Screen?
item.dc:creator: @CaZz_TaZz CaZz TaZz
item.description:
@CaZz_TaZz wrote:

Hey Guys, Okay So I Downloaded Luminosity 474 v1 And I Really Like It Because Npc/Players Are Clipped So Its Perfect For Me Because I’m A Beginner But Everytime I Click On Something These Random Things Come In Chat Bar: Example “Actionbutton: 33206 Fight mode: 2 Dialouge action: 0” Keeps Comming Up And Its Anoying, How Do I Turn This Off So It Doesn’t Keep Spamming My Chat Bar Or Other Players When I Eventually Get It Online?

Read full topic
item.source: Luminosity 474 Debug Mode On? Actions On Screen?
